room_title: Escape room "Professor Jones' Office" by Lock and Key Escape in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: So much fun! We would have never escaped had it not been for Professor Jones' assistant. We had a really fun time! We will come back again!

room_title: Escape room "Professor Jones' Office" by Lock and Key Escape in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Just did one of their rooms today and it was brilliant! I'd never done an escape room before and they made it really fun! We did Professor Jones' Office, and boy was it exciting when we solved the different puzzles!If you're looking for something fun with some friends, go check this place out!

room_title: Escape room "Professor Jones' Office" by Lock and Key Escape in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Had the best experience tonight! Alex was fun, friendly, and greeted us with such happiness! Loved the room, Alex was just the right amount of interactive to help us on the way. It was affordable and worth every cent, can't wait to try the new rooms at the new location! Will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Professor Jones' Office" by Lock and Key Escape in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: We've done quite a few escape rooms now and this was hands down the best! The puzzles are intricate and well thought out. Highly recommend this place. We also had three people in our group who had never done an escape room and they also had a blast.

room_title: Escape room "Professor Jones' Office" by Lock and Key Escape in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: All of you people looking at this page deciding whether or not to do this activity with your friends and family...do it. You won't regret it in the end. The room my friends and I did was Professor Jones room, which was super fun to look for clues and figure them out. Now stop reading this and go and do one of these rooms. You'll have a blast. Trust me.
